name: Hololive Councilrys RPG
description:
Council Assemble!

Embark on a journey with Hololive Council and Project Hope’s IRyS to uncover the mystery of the dreaded EN Curse. After some unusually strong attacks by the EN Curse, the Council seeks to investigate for a source. What they find waiting for them sends the entire Council, and their world, into disarray. 

Hololive CouncilRyS RPG is a fangame and love letter to Hololive CouncilRyS, built in RPG Maker MZ with custom art assets by me and original musical arrangements of Hololive songs by Jeremy Robson. Expect the game to be about 3 hours long.

Meet the Council! Fauna

As the Keeper of Nature, Fauna can utilize its power to defeat enemies, but she can also tap into nature's healing capability to reconstitute her team. She is quick and otherwise well rounded. 

Bae

As the embodiment of Chaos, Bae uses powerful explosions to send enemies packing! Boasting a wide variety of skills, her next move is always unpredictable. She is resilient but if you aren't careful, she can run out of MP quick!

Kronii

As the Warden of Time, Kronii wields immense power. She can obliterate enemies with her swords and lightning, or she can manipulate time to gain the upper hand. She possesses both a powerful offense and defense.

IRyS

As a nephilim and an agent of Hope, IRyS inspires her team--healing and buffing them or debuffing enemies through song. Her magic capabilities are unmatched, but her defense is low. 

Mumei

As the Guardian of Civilization, Mumei wields powerful skills which can rain destruction on her enemies with fire and weapons. Her attack stat is unmatched, but she also lacks defense.

Controls:
  • Z: Confirm
  • X : Cancel
  • Shift (Hold): Run
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
Credits:
  • Development, art, writing: Kebbie (@IMKebbie)
  • Music: Jeremy Robson (@composerdev)

Plugins: Visustella, Hakuen Studio, Moghunter, Casper Gaming, kchavezdev, Chroma9, Mokusei Penguin, Aesica, SnakeKillerX.

All sound effects were either created for the game or available for non-commercial or commercial use.

Special thanks to @DenouemenK @SaraValesteinPL @Axel46761300 @Gigi80945558, and Roger Yu for helping with playtesting, and @JankenPomme for helping arrange QA!

Disclaimer:

This is an unofficial fangame made in adherence to Cover’s fan work guidelines. I am not associated with Cover in any way. The writing is my own work of fiction. 

If you'd like to email me, you can reach me at imdrkebbie@gmail.com
